                                                                       long timeout)
Creates a new PingRequest.

Parameters:
source - MessageAddress of Agent issuing the PingRequest
target - MessageAddress of Agent to be pinged
timeout - milliseconds before PingRequest will time out
Returns:
PingRequest

newHeartbeatRequest

public org.cougaar.tools.robustness.sensors.HeartbeatRequest newHeartbeatRequest(org.cougaar.core.mts.MessageAddress source,
                                                                                 org.cougaar.core.mts.MessageAddress target,
                                                                                 long reqTimeout,
                                                                                 long hbFrequency,
                                                                                 long hbTimeout,
                                                                                 boolean onlyOutOfSpec,
                                                                                 float percentOutOfSpec)
Deprecated. Use multiple targets version of this method instead.

Creates a new HeartbeatRequest.

Parameters:
source - MessageAddress of agent requesting the Heartbeat
target - MessageAddress of agent providing the Heartbeat
reqTimeout - Request timeout in milliseconds
hbFrequency - Heartbeat frequency in milliseconds
hbTimeout - Heartbeat timeout in milliseconds
onlyOutOfSpec - only report if heartbeat is late, as specified by hbFrequency
percentOutOfSpec - only report when heartbeat is this much later than specified by hbFrequency
Returns:
HeartbeatRequest

newHeartbeatRequest

public org.cougaar.tools.robustness.sensors.HeartbeatRequest newHeartbeatRequest(org.cougaar.core.mts.MessageAddress source,
                                                                                 java.util.Set targets,
                                                                                 long reqTimeout,
                                                                                 long hbFrequency,
                                                                                 long hbTimeout,
                                                                                 boolean onlyOutOfSpec,
                                                                                 float percentOutOfSpec)
Creates a new HeartbeatRequest.

Parameters:
source - MessageAddress of agent requesting the Heartbeat
targets - Set of MessageAddresses of agents providing the Heartbeats
reqTimeout - Request timeout in milliseconds
hbFrequency - Heartbeat frequency in milliseconds
hbTimeout - Heartbeat timeout in milliseconds
onlyOutOfSpec - only report if heartbeat is late, as specified by hbFrequency
percentOutOfSpec - only report when heartbeat is this much later than specified by hbFrequency
Returns:
HeartbeatRequest
